    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1641</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">History of chocolate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte der Schokolade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire de chocolat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History do chocolate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia di cioccolato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία της σοκολάτας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia del chocolate</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A computer and web based activity on chocolates. learners are asked to read a text and answer questions</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chocolate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Computer und Web eine gegründete Aktivität 
auf Schokoladen Anfängern werden gebeten, um einen Text zu lesen und 
Fragen zu beantworten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un ordinateur et une activité basée par Web sur 
des étudiants de chocolats sont invités pour indiquer un texte et 
pour répondre à des questions</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um computador e uma atividade baseada Web em 
learners dos chocolates são pedidos para ler um texto e para 
responder a perguntas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un calcolatore e un'attività basata Web sui 
principianti del cioccolato sono chiesti per indicare un testo e per 
rispondere alle domande</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας υπολογιστής και βασισμένη μια στον Ιστό 
δραστηριότητα στους αρχαρίους σοκολατών καλούνται να διαβάσουν 
τις ερωτήσεις κειμένων και απάντησης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un ordenador y una actividad basada Web en 
principiantes de los chocolates se piden para leer un texto y para 
contestar a preguntas</string>
          </description>
